mapper.select: SELECT sy05.CSY051, sy06.CSY061, sy05.CSY052, sy08.* FROM sy08 sy08, sy06 sy06, sy05 sy05 WHERE sy08.CSY060=sy06.CSY060 AND sy05.CSY050=sy08.CSY050 AND sy06.csy067=0 AND sy08.CSY085=0 AND sy08.csy050 = #{csy050}
select * from sy08 where CSY085=0 and CSY080 = #{csy080}
mapper.insert: insert into sy08 (CSY060, CSY050, CSY081, CSY082, CSY083, CSY084, CSY085) values (#{csy060,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy050,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy081,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy082,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csy083,jdbcType=DATE}, #{csy084,jdbcType=DATE}, #{csy085,jdbcType=TINYINT})
